common.no_clans_found:
No clans were found on this server for the specified input! 
Use </setup enable:813041692085059609> command to link a clan.
common.no_clans_linked:
No clans are linked to this server. Why not link some? 
Use </setup enable:813041692085059609> command to link a clan.
common.clan_limit:
The maximum number of clans has reached. Please consider supporting us on our [Patreon](https://patreon.com/clashperk) to add more than two clans.

Already a patron? Use </redeem:875440359549837362> command.
common.patron_only:
This command is only available on Patron servers. Please consider supporting us on our [Patreon](https://patreon.com/clashperk) to use this command.

Already a patron? Use </redeem:875440359549837362> command.
common.clan_verification:
We need to ensure that you are a leader or co-leader of this clan. Please verify your player account with the API token.
Use the </verify:813041692252962827> command to verify your player account. The API token is available in the Game settings.
common.no_option: Qualcosa è andato storto durante l'esecuzione di questo comando. (opzione non trovata)
common.no_data: Al momento non sono disponibili dati. Stiamo ancora raccogliendo!
common.no_clan_data: Non ci sono dati disponibili per {{clan}}. Stiamo ancora raccogliendo!
common.fetch_failed: Qualcosa è andato storto durante il recupero dei dati dall'API.

component.expired: Questo componente non è più attivo. Eseguire nuovamente il comando.
component.unauthorized: È necessario eseguire il comando per interagire con i componenti.

common.no_clan_tag:
You must provide a clan tag to execute this command! 
Alternatively, you can link a default clan to your profile using the </link create:857281486662926407> command.
common.no_player_tag:
You must provide a player tag to execute this command!, 
Alternatively, you can link some accounts to your profile using the </link create:857281486662926407> command.
common.clan_not_linked:
No clan is linked to {{user}}. 
Use </setup enable:813041692085059609> to link a clan.
common.player_not_linked: No player is linked to {{user}}. Use </link create:857281486662926407> command to link a player.
common.guild_unauthorized: This server is not authorized for {{clan}}. Use </link create:857281486662926407> command to link a clan.

status_code.400: Il client ha fornito parametri errati per la richiesta.

status_code.500: Si è verificato un errore sconosciuto durante la gestione della richiesta.
status_code.503: Service is temporarily unavailable because of maintenance break in the game.
